channel.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
channel.description: Ok, I made a Plank Make spell for my server. Ingame, it does the emote and gfx. But it does not delete log, make plank, delete runes, or even give exp. I noticed that on the server command box, it has this error everytime it is used: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2en9mk1.jpg[/img] Help please :(

item.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Player class.

Look at the MAGIC_SPELLS array.[/quote]
Found them. But no lunar spell ID’s?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Tatemo:

No. Go and look at the array and find out what each part of it is.

addSkillXP(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[SPELL_ID][7] * Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE, 6);
[/quote]

Not sure what the 7 is.

Can’t actually find the method yet.[/quote]
Ahh, thanks guys. Do you know where I can find the magic ID number?

Read full topic

No. Go and look at the array and find out what each part of it is.

item.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I Vain I:

Are you sure the spell ID is 90, cause that’s what is causing the exception.

Wait, I thought 90 in that was exp…?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

                   addSkillXP(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[90][7] * Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE, 6);

There is your error.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]ArrayIndexOutOfBounds?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Show me the code, and inform me on which class you have it in.

Also give a brief description of what the function should do.[/quote]

public void plankmake() { if(c.playerLevel[6] < 86) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell."); return; } if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1511,1)) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,15) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075,3)) { c.startAnimation(6298); c.gfx100(1063); addSkillXP(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[90][7] * Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); refreshSkill(6); c.getItems().deleteItem(557,c.getItems().getItemSlot(557),15); c.getItems().deleteItem(561,c.getItems().getItemSlot(560),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(9075,c.getItems().getItemSlot(9075),3); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes to cast this spell."); } } }
Note: There are no errors when compiling.
It should take the log (1511) and turn it into a plank (960).

Read full topic
